title: RP not showing
body: Hi, I just purchased $35 worth of RP for my account and my league client says I dont have it even though my money has been taken out of my bank account

replies.body:
Try restarting your client if you haven't already, often that's enough to force the update. Failing that, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

It'll probably show up anyway in an hour or two, but doesn't hurt to have an active ticket in case it doesn't.
